# templates

Configuration and file templates

---

## Purpose

This folder contains template files for project configuration and setup.

## Contents

- `settings.json.template` - Claude Code settings template with checkpoint configuration

## Usage

Copy template files and customize for your needs:
```bash
cp settings.json.template ~/.claude/settings.json
# Edit settings.json with your preferences
```
